description: Responsible to migrate legacy .NetFramework system to Microservices architecture based on .Net8 and implementing new features (RabbitMQ, Redis, SqlServer, etc).
Developed and maintained the company's e-commerce platform, including the website and mobile applications.Architecture frontend framework.(.Net, Vue, Rabbit, SqlServer, Azure DevOps)
Refactoring and developing mobinnet ecare system, build mobile application of eCare, build Moninnet cloud system (Mobicloud), leading Frontend team.
Building software solutions for customers, building multiple startup projects. Build IOT based solutions.
